chart_description: This chart displays the rate of serviced input/output (I/O) operations for all disks. It helps to monitor how much I/O activity is occurring on the system.

dimension_descriptions.read: This dimension represents the rate of read I/O operations. It indicates the speed at which data is being read from disks.
dimension_descriptions.write: This dimension represents the rate of write I/O operations. It indicates the speed at which data is being written to disks.
